channel.title: I need help adding playtime to my characters files
channel.description: can anyone nice help me add playtime to characters files and a command like ::played to see thier playtime? :D <3

item.title: I need help adding playtime to my characters files
item.dc:creator: @Racist_Turtle Racist Turtle
item.description:
@Racist_Turtle wrote:

I suppose a simple way to do this is to make an instance variable in Player.java I presume? Thereâ€™s a calender/time class already in the Java API, so while they are on (simple boolean), just have the time from that API activate and start counting like a clock.

Every time they log out simply save the variable to the character files through a stream just like the other information that is stored in the character files.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help adding playtime to my characters files
